title: Demon Slayer
description: In ancient times, a legend spoke of man-eating demons haunting deep forests, forcing villagers indoors after dark. But hope flickered in the form of a Demon Slayer, sworn to vanquish these bloodthirsty fiends. For Tanjiro, this legend became grim reality when his family fell victim to a brutal massacre, leaving only his sister Nezuko aliveâ€”a demon, yet still clinging to her humanity. Determined to save her, Tanjiro embarks on a perilous quest, battling demons and seeking a cure for Nezuko's curse.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
description: Jujutsu Kaisen follows the story of Yuji Itadori, a high school student who joins a secret organization of sorcerers to exorcise curses and protect humanity from supernatural threats.

title: My Hero Academia
description: My Hero Academia follows the story of Izuku Midoriya, a young boy born without superpowers in a world where they are commonplace. Despite this, he still dreams of becoming a hero.

title: Solo Leveling
description: Solo Leveling follows the story of Sung Jin-Woo, a low-ranking hunter who becomes one of the strongest hunters after awakening a unique power known as 'Player'.

title: Fairy Tail
description: Fairy Tail follows the adventures of Lucy Heartfilia, a young celestial wizard, and Natsu Dragneel, a fire-breathing mage, as they join the famous Fairy Tail guild and embark on various quests.

title: Blue Lock
description: Blue Lock follows the story of Yoichi Isagi, a talented soccer player who is invited to join the Blue Lock program, where the country's top strikers are gathered and trained to become the ultimate striker.

title: Your Lie in April
description: Your Lie in April follows the story of Kousei Arima, a former child prodigy in piano who lost his ability to hear the sound of his own playing after the death of his mother. He meets a violinist named Kaori Miyazono, who helps him rediscover his love for music.

title: Naruto
description: Naruto follows the story of Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja with dreams of becoming the strongest ninja and leader of his village, known as the Hokage. Along his journey, he forms bonds with his friends and faces various challenges.

title: The Apothecary Diaries
description: The Apothecary follows the story of Light Yagami, a high school student who stumbles upon a mysterious notebook that allows him to kill anyone whose name he writes in it. As he uses the notebook to rid the world of criminals, he attracts the attention of a genius detective known as L.

title: Mushoku Tensei
description: Mushoku Tensei follows the story of Rudeus Greyrat, a NEET who is reincarnated into a fantasy world as a baby. With the memories of his past life intact, he resolves to make the most of his second chance and become the greatest mage in the world.

title: Attack On Titan
description: In a world where humanity resides within enormous walled cities to protect themselves from Titans, gigantic humanoid creatures, a young boy named Eren Yeager becomes determined to fight back when the Titans breach his hometown's walls and devour his mother. This sets him on a path of vengeance and discovery, uncovering dark secrets about the Titans and his own origins.
